__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: Instantiate the class Nextcloud by connecting the given user to the given url

getSize.name: getSize
getSize.summary: Returns the size of the given dir or file, if no path is given it returns the size of the root folder

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Deletes the given file or folder

exists.name: exists
exists.summary: Returns true if the given $path exists

mkdir.name: mkdir
mkdir.summary: Creates a dir at the given path

copy.name: copy
copy.summary: Copies the given file or folder to the given destination, if the given destination already exists throws an error.

rename.name: rename
rename.summary: Renames files or folder from the $old name to the $new name-

isFile.name: isFile
isFile.summary: Returns true if the given $path corresponds to a file.

isDir.name: isDir
isDir.summary: Returns true if the given $path corresponds to a directory.

filemtime.name: filemtime
filemtime.summary: Returns the date of last modification of the given path

download.name: download

getItems.name: getItems
getItems.summary: Returns an array of items contained in the given path, if no path is given it returns the root content, if the argument $detailed is given includes details of size and last modification time in the item

getRealPath.name: getRealPath

getSystemPath.name: getSystemPath

getContents.name: getContents
getContents.summary: Returns the content of the given file

getFiles.name: getFiles
getFiles.summary: Returns the fies contained in the given $path

upload.name: upload

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call
